rules.title: Accessory structures site planning - Section A: Combo garage / small pool cabana (side by side)

qualifiers.scope: Accessory structures located in rear yard

rules.title: Accessory structures site planning - Section B: Stand-alone pool cabana

qualifiers.scope: Accessory structures located in rear yard

mandatory: CUP required if greater than 200 sf

rules.title: Accessory structures site planning - Section C: Office above garage

qualifiers.scope: Accessory structures located within buildable area

procedures.IR_requirement: Subject to Planning Department's Individual Review

general_notes.note: Site planning for accessory buildings differs from that for parking structures in one way. A special allowance enables garages to be located in the rear/side yards even when the lot is not deep enough to maintain the 75' minimum distance from the front lot line. This does not apply to non-parking accessory structures.
Because this structure is 2 stories, it must be located within the buildable area regardless of the distances from the lot lines and is subject to Individual Review (IR).
